description.value:
Chest containing stasis field to keep items safe. Locked by a blood-detecting sensor that can measure quantities of alcohols and drugs, allowing a user to specifically inebriate themselves before setting it up. If lock is destroyed field collapses, destroying contents.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
